mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(CUSTOMER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, RG_DATE, ORDER_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_NAME, TOTAL_PRICE) VALUES (#{customer_id}, #{product_id}, NOW(), #{order_quantity},#{product_price},#{product_name}, #{total_price})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET ORDER_QUANTITY = #{order_quantity}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{order_quantity} * PRODUCT_PRICE WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET CHECKED = 1 WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND CHECKED = 1
